extension.description:
JD Read More - Plugin

With JD Read More you'll be able to create an accordion Read More effect for your Joomla! Articles. JD Read More keeps all your article text on the same page showing 'some' of your article text and hides the rest based on how you configured the extension's setting.

JD Read More formerly known as Read More-PRO from Graphicaholic is now moved to JoomDev along with other Extensions. Check out the Announcement here.

Support | Demo | More Details

field.name: articlecontainerHeight
field.label: Read More article height
field.description: Enter height value only. Do not include 'px' or 'em' or '%' after value!

field.name: articlemediaHeight
field.label: Read More Smartphone height
field.description: Include either the 'px' or 'em' after your specific value. Example: 22em or 22px.

field.name: readmorebackground
field.label: Read More background color
field.description: Type in transparent for no background color

field.name: readmorebackgroundheight
field.label: Read More background height
field.description: Height of background block. Include either px or em after value.

field.name: readmorefontsize
field.label: Read More font size
field.description: Use px or em after font size value. Blank value will use your template default body size

field.name: readmorefontweight
field.label: Read More font weight
field.description: Use whole values starting with 100 is light font weight with 900 being double bold.
